ASOS (Camden Town, London) - Senior .net Developers - ASOS Marketplace

ASOS is a leading and fast growing online fashion retailer. ASOS Marketplace launched 2 years ago with the aim of building a "Global Fashion Democracy"; a platform to allow anyone, anywhere to sell fashion. It was a greenfield project and has been carefully cultivated inside and out to provide a great experience for buyers, sellers, its developers and business users alike.

Marketplace is now at a turning point and 2013 is going to be a big year for the site. We're looking for talented C# devs to help us take it to the next level.

In many ways we operate like a startup. We use:

- ASP.NET MVC - SQL Server - MongoDb - Solr - NServiceBus - Castle Windsor - JQuery - agile - with a lower case "a"

Sound interesting? Apply at http://www.linkedin.com/jobs?viewJob=&jobId=4270875
